name: InternLM
description: InternLM is an open-source large language model series developed by Shanghai AI Laboratory, including InternLM, InternLM2, and InternLM3.
description_zh: 书生是由上海人工智能实验室开发的开源大语言模型系列，包括 InternLM、InternLM2 和 InternLM3。

products.name: InternLM3
products.description: Latest generation open-source large language model
products.description_zh: 最新一代开源大语言模型
